title: Reading Practice
goal: Practice parsing and understanding Lojban text.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Journal vocabulary review:

ca lo ca djedi = ?
mi puca'o gunka = ?
pe'i = ?

(Answers: today, I was working, in my opinion)

New Material (5-7 min)

Reading Strategy

  1. Identify the main bridi — Find the selbri
  2. Note tenses and aspects — pu/ca/ba, co'a/ca'o
  3. Find abstractions — lo nu, lo du'u
  4. Trace relative clauses — poi/noi back to ke'a
  5. Check connectives — .e, je, gi'e, .i ba bo

Practice Text 1

la .tam. pu ki cadzu bu'u lo foldi
.i viska lo gerku poi barda
.i ri bajra fa'a la .tam.
.i la .tam. co'a se xanka
.i ku'i lo gerku cu pendo
.i ri bredi lo nu kelci
.i .ui la .tam. gleki

Parse and translate:

Translation

Tom walked in the field (past tense set). He saw a dog which was big. It ran toward Tom. Tom started being scared. But the dog was friendly. It was ready to play. Yay, Tom was happy.

Practice Text 2

mi jinvi lo du'u lo nu cilre la .jbobau. cu vajni
.i ki'u lo nu ri logji bangu
.i lo nu tavla ri cu cinri je nandu
.i mi djica lo nu ba certu
Translation

I think that learning Lojban is important. Because it's a logical language. Speaking it is interesting and difficult. I want to become skilled (in the future).

Unknown Words

When you find unknown words:

  1. Try to parse from context
  2. Note the place structure from usage
  3. Look up if needed

Key Point

Parse systematically: main bridi → tense → abstractions → connections.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Parse This Text

lo prenu poi tadni la .jbobau. cu cilre so'i da
.i ri djuno lo du'u lo bangu cu vajni
.i ri nelci lo nu tcidu .e lo nu ciska

Questions:

  1. Who is the main subject?
  2. What do they learn?
  3. What do they like doing?
Answers
  1. The person who studies Lojban
  2. Many things
  3. Reading and writing

Full translation: The person who studies Lojban learns many things. They know that language is important. They like reading and writing.

Exercise 2: Identify Grammar

In this sentence, identify:

mi djuno lo du'u la .alis. poi mi pendo cu djica lo nu klama
  1. Main bridi
  2. Abstraction
  3. Relative clause
Answers
  1. mi djuno (I know)
  2. lo du'u...cu djica lo nu klama (that...wants to go)
  3. poi mi pendo (who is my friend)

Full: I know that Alice, who is my friend, wants to go.

poi mi pendo (who is my friend)

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Read aloud and translate:

lo solri cu co'a se viska
.i lo cipni cu co'a sanga
.i mi gleki lo nu cikna
Translation

The sun started being seen (rose). The birds started singing. I'm happy to be awake.

Today's Practice

Reading checklist:

  • Identify main selbri
  • Note tenses
  • Find abstractions
  • Trace relative clauses
  • Understand connectives

Summary

You practiced reading and parsing Lojban texts systematically.
